HarmonyOS å®ç°ç”¨æˆ·é¦–æ¬¡å¯åŠ¨æ—¶å¼¹å‡ºåè®®å¼¹çª— â€‹

æ›´æ–°: 2025/8/19 å­—æ•°: 0 å­— æ—¶é•¿: 0 åˆ†é’Ÿ

è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¼¹çª— â€‹

CustomDialogComponent.etsï¼ˆç®€åŒ–ï¼Œå»é™¤ç»å¤§éƒ¨åˆ†æ ·å¼ä»£ç ï¼Œä¾¿äºæŸ¥çœ‹é€»è¾‘ç±»çš„ä»£ç ï¼‰

æ”¯æŒâ€œæŸ¥çœ‹éšç§æ”¿ç­–/ç”¨æˆ·åè®®â€â€œåŒæ„/ä¸åŒæ„â€å››ä¸ªåŠ¨ä½œã€‚

è·³è½¬åè®®ç•Œé¢ä½¿ç”¨äº† router.pushUrl({ url: 'pages/PrivacyPolicy' })

  • åŒæ„æ—¶å†™å…¥ policy_agreed=trueï¼›

  • ä¸åŒæ„æ—¶ terminateSelf() é€€å‡ºï¼›

typescript
@CustomDialog
export default struct CustomDialogComponent {
  controller: CustomDialogController;
  cancel: () => void = () => {};
  confirm: () => void = () => {};
  openPrivacy?: () => void;
  openAgreement?: () => void;

  build() {
    Column() {
      Text('ç”¨æˆ·åè®®ä¸éšç§æ”¿ç­–')
      Text('ç”¨æˆ·åè®®ä¸éšç§æ”¿ç­–')
        .textAlign(TextAlign.Center)

      Text('ä¸ºä¿éšœæ‚¨çš„æƒç›Šï¼Œè¯·å…ˆé˜…è¯»å¹¶åŒæ„ç”¨æˆ·åè®®ä¸éšç§æ”¿ç­–åç»§ç»­ä½¿ç”¨æœ¬åº”ç”¨ã€‚')
        .textAlign(TextAlign.Center)

      Row({ space: 12 }) {
        Button({ type: ButtonType.Normal }) {
          Text('æŸ¥çœ‹éšç§æ”¿ç­–')
        }
        .onClick(() => {
          this.openPrivacy && this.openPrivacy();
          this.controller.close();
        })

        Button({ type: ButtonType.Normal }) {
          Text('æŸ¥çœ‹ç”¨æˆ·åè®®')
        }
        .onClick(() => {
          this.openAgreement && this.openAgreement();
          this.controller.close();
        })
      }

      Row({ space: 12 }) {
        Button({ type: ButtonType.Normal }) {
          Text('ä¸åŒæ„')
        }
        .onClick(() => {
          this.controller.close();
          this.cancel();
        })

        Button({ type: ButtonType.Capsule }) {
          Text('åŒæ„å¹¶ç»§ç»­')
        }
         .onClick(() => {
           this.controller.close();
           this.confirm();
         })
      }
    }
  }
}

åœ¨åº”ç”¨é¦–é¡µä¸­å¯¼å…¥

typescript
import CustomDialogComponent from '../view/CustomDialogComponent';
1

æ·»åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ§åˆ¶å™¨

// é¦–å¯åè®®å¼¹çª—æ§åˆ¶å™¨ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼‰
  private firstStartController: CustomDialogController = new CustomDialogController({
    builder: CustomDialogComponent({
      openPrivacy: () => router.pushUrl({ url: 'pages/PrivacyPolicy' }),
      openAgreement: () => router.pushUrl({ url: 'pages/UserAgreement' }),
      confirm: async () => {
        try {
          const uiCtx = this.getUIContext().getHostContext() as common.UIAbilityContext;
          const prefs = await dataPreferences.getPreferences(uiCtx, 'app_prefs');
          await prefs.put('policy_agreed', true);
          await prefs.flush();
        } catch (e) {
          const msg = (e as Error)?.message ?? String(e);
          hilog.error(DOMAIN, TAG, 'save policy flag failed: ' + msg);
        }
      },
      cancel: () => {
        try {
          const uiCtx = this.getUIContext().getHostContext() as common.UIAbilityContext;
          uiCtx.terminateSelf();
        } catch (e) {
          const msg = (e as Error)?.message ?? String(e);
          hilog.error(DOMAIN, TAG, 'terminateSelf failed: ' + msg);
        }
      }
    }),
    autoCancel: false,
    alignment: DialogAlignment.Center
  });

ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªæ£€æŸ¥é€»è¾‘ï¼Œåœ¨åº”ç”¨æ‰“å¼€æ—¶ï¼Œæ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å‹¾é€‰äº†åŒæ„åè®®

onPageShow() {
    // é¦–æ¬¡å¯åŠ¨æ£€æŸ¥
    (async () => {
      try {
        const uiCtx = this.getUIContext().getHostContext() as common.UIAbilityContext;
        const prefs = await dataPreferences.getPreferences(uiCtx, 'app_prefs');
        const agreed = (await prefs.get('policy_agreed', false)) as boolean;
        if (!agreed) {
          this.firstStartController.open();
        }
      } catch (e) {
        const msg = (e as Error)?.message ?? String(e);
        hilog.error(DOMAIN, TAG, 'read policy flag failed: ' + msg);
      }
    })();

    this.filterPublicNotes();
    this.filterPrivateNotes();
    if (!this.isShowingPrivate) {
      this.fetchPoetry();
    }
  }
